label: 四巻経
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The Dharmarakşa translation of the Golden Light Sutra in four books and eighteen chapters.  The sutra teaches that the Four Heavenly Kings protect virtuous rulers (p. 594).↓[HW: Another name for　Konkōmyōkyō 金光明経, or the Golden Splendor Sutra" <Sk.　Suvarna-prabhāsa(-uttama)-sūtra>]"
